Key Match Events: Gleyber Torres scored on a pop fly that ricocheted off shortstop Brayan Rocchio's glove
Tanner Bibee gave up a run in the first inning
Cade Smith replaced Tanner Bibee in the fourth inning
David Fry pinch-hit for Bo Naylor in the fourth inning
Austin Hedges struck out swinging to end the fifth inning with the bases loaded
Clay Holmes struck out Austin Hedges in the sixth inning
Aaron Judge hit a home run in the seventh inning to put the game to bed
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Judge expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win
Stephen Vogt, Guardians manager, acknowledged the game's unpredictability and the importance of taking chances
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was described as chaotic with numerous errors and missed opportunities
The Yankees' win gives them a 2-0 series lead heading to Cleveland
